snippet: Watching the first Saudi woman compete in the Olympics, many in Riyadh expressed doubts about whether life for women would change in the Arab world.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley The TV Watch column notes that for many Saudis watching the first female Olympian from their country compete at the London Games, doubts persist about whether life for women will change in the Arab world.
lead_paragraph: Watching the first Saudi woman compete in the Olympics, many in Riyadh expressed doubts about whether life for women would change in the Arab world.

headline.seo: Saudis Greet Shaherkani’s Olympic First With a Shrug
headline.main: Saudis Greet Olympic First With a Shrug
headline.print_headline: Saudis Greet Olympic First With a Shrug
